name: Pantry Pirate Radio
initializeCommand: bash -c 'ENV_PATH=".docker/compose/.env"; mkdir -p "$(dirname "$ENV_PATH")"; if [ ! -f "$ENV_PATH" ]; then echo "Creating .env file from .env.example..."; cp .env.example "$ENV_PATH" && sed -i "s/your_secure_password/devcontainer/g" "$ENV_PATH" && sed -i "s/your_api_key_here/placeholder_key/g" "$ENV_PATH" && sed -i "s/your_anthropic_api_key_here/placeholder_key/g" "$ENV_PATH" && sed -i "s/your_github_personal_access_token_here/placeholder_token/g" "$ENV_PATH" && sed -i "s/PUBLISHER_PUSH_ENABLED=false/PUBLISHER_PUSH_ENABLED=false/g" "$ENV_PATH" && echo "# Codespaces PostgreSQL compatibility" >> "$ENV_PATH" && echo "PGUSER=postgres" >> "$ENV_PATH" && echo "PGPASSWORD=devcontainer" >> "$ENV_PATH" && echo "✅ .env file created at $ENV_PATH for dev container with Codespaces compatibility"; else echo "✅ .env file already exists at $ENV_PATH"; fi'
postCreateCommand: set -e && echo 'Configuring poetry...' && poetry config virtualenvs.create true && poetry config virtualenvs.in-project false && poetry config virtualenvs.path /workspace/.virtualenvs && echo 'Running git config...' && git config --unset-all core.hooksPath || true && echo 'Running poetry install...' && poetry install --no-interaction && echo 'Installing pre-commit hooks...' && sh configure-poetry.sh && pre-commit install
